welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Morton, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bristol Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 at Bristol Airport serves low-cost airlines such as Ryanair and easyJet.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gloucestershire Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at RAF Station Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at RAF Station Airport is reserved for military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.
